rooms.description: Vastu-aligned entrance with north facing door for positive energy.
Large open space for social gatherings with Mediterranean aesthetic elements such as arches and mosaics. Positioned to enhance natural light from the east.
Modern kitchen with island counter; placed in south-east corner following Vastu principles for prosperity.
Adjacent to the living room and kitchen, ensuring a smooth flow of space.
Spacious bedroom with south-west orientation for restful sleep; includes built-in wardrobe and balcony overlooking garden.
Well-insulated bathroom placed in the north-east direction per Vastu for cleanliness and clarity.
Dedicated quiet space in the east wing to promote focus and creativity.

openings.notes: Ensures an auspicious entry as per Vastu principles.
Garage integrated into design; includes access to the main house via a covered walkway.
Provides natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu.
